I'd like to get a fix in for M8.  It doesn't really impact the usability of the
wizard but errors such as this polute the log and make tracking down other
issues more difficult.  Any objections?

Created an attachment (id=8743)
Patch for org.eclipse.ui.workbench
Fix in HEAD, committed with Tod.
